category: news
title: "Zebrafish and AI replace some mouse experiments in cancer research"
excerpt: "Researchers at Uppsala University have used AI to develop a new method to study brain cancer. The method is based on transplanting tumor cells from patients to fish embryos, followed by observation with AI."
